title: Queen of Fire
description: Everything has changed.I fought against the darkness and tried to convince myself that I lived life on the edge in the grey. But I was wrong. Being in the dark was in my blood.They changed me.They may think they have ruined me but my desire for danger was a fire inside, and they just poured gasoline on it. I was always told never to play with fire or I'd get burnt. But what they failed to realize was that I am the fire. And now I'm coming for revenge.The infamous Spades Trio - Reed Xanderson, Grayson Parker and Colton Cadman, might be the Kings of the Black Spades but I'm a wildcard - and with the Kings by my side, the Hunters are about to become the hunted.Watch me rise.
author: Steph Macca
